<strong style="display: block;">

<label><input type="radio" name="module3_mcq_q86" value="B"> B. 12.0%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module3_mcq_q86" value="C"> C. 14.2%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module3_mcq_q86" value="D"> D. 15.0%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module3_mcq_q86" value="E"> E. 16.8%</label><br>
</form>
